title: Clinical Practical Competency Enhancement: Mathematics Performance Prediction Modeling Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Student performance prediction models can be built using online formative assessment data
The impact of key features extracted from learning analytics tools (completion rate, timestamp, score) on final grades can be explained
The application of learning analytics insights in instructional design can be experimentally validated in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
